The Doomed Mercury
 
 The most recent images sent by the space-craft Messenger were stunning, as have astronomers expressed; it showed about 30% of the surface of Mercury that was not before seen.
 
 These images displayed a large number of craters with many extensively large longitudinal rays or fissures.
 http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/messenger/main/index.html
 
 The explanation of such manifestations on Mercury:
 
 Mercury has passed some serious changes following its cessation from axial rotation which resulted from the depletion of its central heat. 
 
 Mercury is the smallest planet in our solar system; therefore its central heat finished before the rest of the planets; it was the first planet to stop its axial rotation.
 
 Then following that, it suffered many changes in its atmosphere and the surface of the planet.
 
 Mercury became colder than before, and its volume shrunk and it contracted; which led to the cracking and breaking of its surface and the appearance of these trenches and fissures.
 
 In addition, after it lost its central heat and becoming generally colder than before, it has become exposed to the falling of large number of comets which prefer the cold regions of the cold planets. These comets will dip under the ground, leaving behind some bare craters.
 
 Then whatever rivers and seas that were ever there on Mercury have dried up leaving the exposed basins as valleys.
 
 Its mountains started to be seared by the heat of the sun in the side facing the sun, then the calcium carbonate and other compounds in the rocks started to be liberate CO2 and some other gases by the heat effect, and the rocks of the mountains became like dust which later was swept by the wind to the valleys making all that as somewhat flattened land. 
 
 This is in His saying – be glorified – in the Quran 20: 105-107
 وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنْ الْجِبَالِ فَقُلْ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسْفًا . فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعًا صَفْصَفًا . لا تَرَى فِيهَا عِوَجًا وَلا أَمْتًا 
 The explanation:
 (They are asking you [Mohammed] about the mountains [of Mecca on that day.] Say: ‘My Lord will smash them [into scattered dust.]
 So He will leave it as a level plain.
 Wherein you will see no hill neither any valley.)
 
 These changes will afflict our Earth, following its stopping its axial rotation, after the depletion of its central heat (after about one thousand years.)
 
 At the start the Earth will pass into changes similar to what happened on Venus, then like the changes on Mercury, which will be followed by Doomsday (after stopping from rotation for one thousand years – and Doomsday will occur after about 2000 years from now.
 
 When the Earth will stop its axial rotation – at the start it will be like Venus now, then it will be like Mercury now:
 
 1- The Venus-like phase
 After the Earth will stop its axial rotation, it will pass into changes similar to what Venus is now: the atmospheric clear layers will become thick smoke, the comets will impact the earth in large number. The mountains will be heated and transform into dust and the wind will carry that sand to the valleys. Seas and rivers will evaporate, and their bottoms will be exposed …etc. 
 http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_2.htm#The_Journey_to_Venus_Is_Dangerous_ 
 
 2- The Mercury-like phase
 The earth will cool down more and its surface will contract and break with many cleavages and trenches. The comets will leave a large number of craters. The gases of the atmosphere will be lost into the space.
 See the subject of: http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_4.htm#The_Burnt_World 
 
 3- The events of Doomsday
 These events will start by the general earthquake which will be followed by the breaking up of the earth into many pieces. In like manner the rest of the planets will be simultaneously destroyed. The sun will explode and break up into 19 pieces.
 
 See the details of such changes at our web page:
 http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_4.htm

 about 'comets preferring the cold regions of cold planets'? 
 
 about the sun splitting into 19 pieces?
 
 

 
 • Mercury is the smallest of the planets and the nearest to the sun; it is relatively faraway from us; it is only just now that some part of its surface has been visualized in this way.
 
 Why is that? Because of its bizarre way of the alleged axial rotation; while in fact it does not rotate around itself, but they say it rotates in retrograde way.
 
 Why does any planet rotate around itself: the energy for such rotation is from the heat stored in its core; which will not last forever; it will gradually decrease until it will finish when the planet will stop its axial rotation, but will keep up revolving around the sun.
 See 
 the subject of: http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_2.htm#The_Reason_for_the_Rotation_of_the_Earth_Around_Itself_
 
 Now because Mercury is the smallest planet, it lost its internal heat before the rest of the planets: at the start it slowed down, then it stopped spinning around itself.
 
 When it stopped its spinning, one hemisphere faced the sun <<< which led to the increase in its temperature to many hundred degrees centigrade.
 The other hemisphere which did not face the sun <<< had extreme coldness.
 
 Then there happened the various changes (that now is happening on Venus) like the permanent cloud of its atmosphere because of the mixing of the various gases of its atmosphere which returned to the same initial phase of smoke which was at the start of its formation.
 See the subject of: http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_2.htm#The_Journey_to_Venus_Is_Dangerous_ 
 
 Then by time, its core became more cold until its volume contracted → which led to the appearance of many trenches and fissures on its surface, and its gases were lost into the space → which led to its surface being clearly seen (in comparison to Venus whose surface is obscure.).
 See the subject of: http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_4.htm#The_Burnt_World 
 
 • Comets: are not dirty ice ! as do they claim; comets are fire masses separated from the sun following some local solar explosions; they are hurled out with extreme speed, they go along without any certain goal or orbit, and being oblong objects they do not spin around themselves neither do they circle around the sun, but they go roaming in the space until they are hunted by some cold object or some frozen area of some planets or moons, when they will fall down and impact that planet.
 See the subject of http://universeandquran.t35.com/new_page_3.htm#Comets 
 
 
 • The sun will break up into 19 pieces:
 Our sun is bigger than the previous sun; the previous sun of the previous solar system was relatively smaller which exploded in the previous Doomsday into 9 pieces: the planets of our present solar system. 
 
 Our sun is bigger; it will break up into 19 pieces in the next Doomsday to form the new planets of the next solar system; this is confirmed by the interpretation of an aya in the Quran 74: 35
 إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
 The explanation: ([That] surely [Saqar] is one of the greatest [suns.]) 
 It means: Saqar [which is the name of the next sun] is one of the large volume suns.
 
 God -be exalted - said in the Quran 74: 30
 عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
 The explanation: ( [Imposed] upon it [the attraction of] nineteen [planets.] )
 It means: Upon it lies the burden of gravitating nineteen planets.
